info.title: AvaTax Brazil
info.description:
The Avatax-Brazil API exposes the most commonly services available for interacting 
with the AvaTax-Brazil services, allowing calculation of taxes, issuing electronic
invoice documents and modifying existing transactions when allowed by tax authorities.
This API is exclusively for use by business with a physical presence in Brazil.

400_BadRequest.description: The request was invalid or cannot be otherwise served.

401_Unauthorized.description: Authentication credentials were missing or incorrect.

403_Forbidden.description: The request is understood, but it has been refused or access is not allowed.

404_NotFound.description: The URI requested is invalid or the resource requested does not exists.

429_TooManyRequests.description: The request cannot be served due to the applications rate limit having been exhausted for the resource.

503_ServiceUnavailable.description: The server is up, but overloaded with requests. Try again later.

code.description: string is a code maintained by the client application to uniquely identify the company for which this transaction is being recorded. It is unique within the context of an Account. It will be limited to 60 characters when creating a Company

name.description: Company name (DBA - Nome de Fantasia),  Used to identify branches/subsidiaries with same name

subjectToSRF1234.description: Company has participation of state-owned capital (it will be considerated like a government entity)

pisSubjectTo.description:
this flag informs if this company is subject to this tax
the default value for this property is TAXABLE,
when set to TAXABLE it doesn't mean that all transaction will be TAXABLE. The system will analise other rules to identify exemptions/exceptions
when set to NOT TAXABLE or EXEMPT, the system will not analise other rules.

cofinsSubjectTo.description:
this flag informs if this company is subject to this tax
the default value for this property is TAXABLE,
when set to TAXABLE it doesn't mean that all transaction will be TAXABLE. The system will analise other rules to identify exemptions/exceptions
when set to NOT TAXABLE or EXEMPT, the system will not analise other rules.

csllSubjectTo.description:
this flag informs if this company is subject to this tax
the default value for this property is TAXABLE,
when set to TAXABLE it doesn't mean that all transaction will be TAXABLE. The system will analise other rules to identify exemptions/exceptions
when set to NOT TAXABLE or EXEMPT, the system will not analise other rules.

receiptsAreFullNoCumulativePisCofins.description:
When th company is REAL PROFIT usually it operates under a Non-Cumulative PIS/COFINS regime
But exist some services that are always Cumulative regime.
If the company has all receipts from Non-Cumulative services this flag will be set to True.
This flag informs special conditions to credit of PIS/COFINS when this company is out of Free zone and  purchases from Free Zone Company
Quando uma empresa fora da Zona Franca adquire uma produto ou servio de uma empresa situada na Zona Franca de Manaus, o crdito de PIS E COFINS segue estas aliquotas diferenciadas.
Fundamentao, art. 5 da Instruo Normativa SRF n 546/2005; art. 3,  12 da Lei n 10.637/2002; art. 3,  17 da Lei n 10.833/2003; art. 4 da Lei n 11.307/2006.
DESTINATRIO ALQUOTAS.
PIS COFINS
a) Venda efetuada a pessoa jurdica estabelecida fora da Zona Franca de Manaus, que apure a Contribuio para o PIS/PASEP no regime de no-cumulatividade dbito 0,65% 3% crdito 1% 4,6%
c) Venda efetuada a pessoa jurdica estabelecida fora da Zona Franca de Manaus, que apure o imposto de renda com base no lucro real e que tenha sua receita, total ou parcialmente, excluda do regime de incidncia no-cumulativa da Contribuio para o PIS/PASEP dbito 1,3% 6% crdito 1,65% 7,6%

inssWithholdSubjectTo.description: On purchase transaction, to force withholding INSS this Flag can be set to True

issWithholdSubjectTo.description: On purchase transaction, to force withhold ISS this Flag can be set to True

irrfWithholdSubjectTo.description:
On purchase transaction, if this flag is FALSE, the system will not withhold IRRF.
if this flag is TRUE the system will analise other rules to define if will have witholding

icmsRateForSimplestaxregime.description:
Actual ICMS Rate for this company (if the company is Tax Regime Simplified).
Aliquota de ICMS da companhia caso Optante do Simples

isExemptByGrossRevenueForSimplestaxregim.description:
ICMS Exempt when Tax Regime is Simplified because total gross revenue is bellow amount defined by state (see PARAN State)
Iseno do ICMS no Simples Nacional para faixa de receita bruta

subjectToPayrollTaxRelief.description: Sujeito  desonerao de folha de pagamento.

certificate.description: digital certificate A1 model, p12, encoded by base64

logo.description: company logo image encoded by base64

user.description: User for login on email server

password.description: Password to login on email server

emailFrom.description: email address to identify the sender e-mail, to send a XML and DANFE

templatemessageToEmail.description: Message to add to email body

authorizedToDownloadNFe.description: Person or company authorized to downloadNFe

federalTaxId.description: Federal tax id, CNPJ or CPF

sealCode.description: Seal Code for ipi tax control (cdigo do selo para controle de IPI)

nFCI.description: Importation content form number (Nmero de controle da FCI - Ficha de Contedo de Importao)

isIcmsStSubstitute.description:
this field inform that this merchandise or product is ICMS Substitute
Must be used when the item is for resale and the company will assume the role of ICMS Substitute (wholesaler, retailer, distributor). Example: when Importing some product the company does not pay IcmsSt at the time of customs clearance but when selling sale the item.
Dever ser utilizado quando a empresa que ir vender a mercadoria sujeita ao ICMS ST for o SUBSTITUTO TRIBUTRIO (Distribuidor, atacadista e varejista), como por exemplo das mercadorias IMPORTADAS, neste sentido, a empresa no ir pagar o ICMS ST no desembarao aduaneiro e ir recolher quando for vender as mesmas.

source.description:
- '0' # National goods - except those treated in codes 3,4, 5 and 8
- '1' # Foreign goods - Imported directly by seller, except those in code 6
- '2' # Foreign goods - Acquired in the internal market (inside Brazil), except those in code 7
- '3' # National goods - Merchandise or goods with imported content above 40% and with less than or equal to 70%
- '4' # National goods from production following 'standard basic processes' as stablished by legislation (standard basic processes are devised to separate simple assembly from manufaturing processes)
- '5' # National goods - Merchandise or goods with imported content equal or below 40%
- '6' # Foreign goods - Directly imported by Seller, without a National Equivalent as listed by Comex and natural gas
- '7' # Foreign goods - Acquired inside Brazil, without a National Equivalent  as listed by Comex and natural gas
- '8' # National goods - Merchandise or goods with imported content above 70%

productType.description:
Tipo fiscal do produto segundo tabela SPED
Fiscal product type by SPED list table
- 'FOR PRODUCT' # 04  Produto Acabado
- 'FOR MERCHANDISE' # 00  Mercadoria para Revenda
- 'NO RESTRICTION' # 99 Outras
- 'SERVICE' # 09  Servios
- 'FEEDSTOCK' # 01  Matria-Prima
- 'FIXED ASSETS' # 08 Ativo Imobilizado
- 'PACKAGING' # 02 Embalagem
- 'PRODUCT IN PROCESS' # 03  Produto em Processo
- 'SUBPRODUCT' # 05  Subproduto
- 'INTERMEDIATE PRODUCT' # 06  Produto Intermedirio
- 'MATERIAL FOR USAGE AND CONSUMPTION' # 07  Material de Uso e Consumo
- 'OTHER INPUTS' # 10  Outros insumos

manufacturerEquivalent.description: Item is merchandise but will be considered product

appropriateIPIcreditWhenInGoing.description: Inform that this item will have rights to aprropriate IPI credit

appropriateICMScreditWhenInGoing.description: Inform that this item will have rights to aprropriate IPI credit

usuallyAppropriatePISCOFINSCredit.description: Subject to appropriate PIS/COFINS credit, when NO CUMULATIVE

isPisCofinsEstimatedCredit.description: The credit PIS/COFINS is subject to purchase form companies, but exist some exceptions, when the credit will be a estimated amount

piscofinsRevenueType.description:
- '01' # Vinculada Exclusivamente a Receita Tributada no Mercado Interno
- '02' # Exclusivamente a Receita No Tributada no Mercado Interno
- '03' # Exclusivamente a Receita de Exportao
- '04' # Vinculada a Receitas Tributadas e No-Tributadas no Mercado Interno
- '05' # Vinculada a Receitas Tributadas no Mercado Interno e de Exportao
- '06' # Vinculada a Receitas No-Tributadas no Mercado Interno e de Exportao
- '07' # Vinculada a Receitas Tributadas e No-Tributadas no Mercado Interno, e de Exportao

icmsBaseDiscountForMonoPhaseSocialContr.description: Discount allowed on icms base when PIS/COFINS are Monophase

nve.description: Nomenclatura de Valor aduaneio e Estatstico - NCM extension code

salesUnitIPIfactor.description: factor to convert sales quantity to IPI taxable quantity when it is by SRF Statutory Retail Price (Pauta)

salesUnitIcmsfactor.description: factor to convert sales quantity to ICMS taxable quantity when it is by SRF Statutory Retail Price (Pauta)

salesUnitIcmsStfactor.description: factor to convert sales quantity to ICMS-ST taxable quantity when it is by SRF Statutory Retail Price (Pauta)

salesUnitPisCofinsfactor.description: factor to convert sales quantity to PIS/COFINS taxable quantity when it is by SRF Statutory Retail Price (Pauta)

purchaseUnitIPIfactor.description: factor to convert purchase quantity to IPI taxable quantity when it is by SRF Statutory Retail Price (Pauta)

purchaseUnitIcmsfactor.description: factor to convert purchase quantity to ICMS taxable quantity when it is by SRF Statutory Retail Price (Pauta)

purchaseUnitIcmsStfactor.description: factor to convert purchase quantity to ICMS-ST taxable quantity when it is by SRF Statutory Retail Price (Pauta)

purchaseUnitPisCofinsfactor.description: factor to convert purchase quantity to PIS/COFINS taxable quantity when it is by SRF Statutory Retail Price (Pauta)

firstUse.description: When the product is new, and will be retail, firt time that it exit it is subject to IPI

withLaborAssignment.description: Applies the "is Labor Assignment" tax scenario. (Cesso de mo de obra).

code.description: this property identify the location, it is unique for this company

type.description: this property identify the location, it is unique for this company

federalTaxId.description: Federal tax id, CNPJ or CPF

stateTaxId.description: state tax id for this location

nfseProcessModel.description:
- 'edi' # City hall has web service and the integration is automatic
- 'xml' # Create RPS specific to City, bat does not have webservice integration
- 'rps' # Create a generic RPS, NF is by hands

EntityType.description: Entity Type (business, individual, federal government, state government, city government, foreign)

FederalTaxRegime.description:
- Federal tax regime
- realProfit - REAL PROFIT LUCRO REAL
- estimatedProfit - ESTIMATED PROFIT / LUCRO PRESUMIDO
- simplified - SIMPLIFIED - OPTANTE TO SIMPLES
- simplifiedOverGrossthreshold - OPTANTE DO SIMPLES COM LIMITE DE GROSS REVENUE
- simplifiedEntrepreneur - SIMPLIFIED ENTREPRENEUR / MEI MICRO EMPREENDEDOR INDIVIDUAL 
- notApplicable - Not Applicable 1 
- individual - INDIVIDUAL / INDIVIDUO

cest.description: tax substitution code - Codigo especificador da Substuicao Tributaria

cstIPI.description:
Inform if this process is subject to IPI taxation on output process
- 'T'  # TAXABLE
- 'Z'  # TAXABLE WITH RATE=0.00
- 'E'  # EXEMPT
- 'N'  # NO TAXABLE
- 'I'  # IMMUNE

ipiLegalTaxClass.description:
Legal tax classificao for IPI (enquadramento tributrio)
When the process has CST IPI 52 or 54, it is mandatory to inform a Reason Code, see Anexo XIV - Cdigo de Enquadramento Legal do IPI from  http://www.nfe.fazenda.gov.br/portal/exibirArquivo.aspx?conteudo=mCnJajU4BKU=

ipiLegalReason.description: Code for the IPI legal reason, this message will be placed on invoice.

code.description: Agast Code. AGAST (Avalara Goods and Services Types) are preset products with default tax definitions available to be used as provided or copied to create an specific comapany item.

lifeTimeStart.description: date when this configuration values starts

lifeTimeEnd.description: date when this configuration values expire

accruablePISTaxation.description:
Inform if this item by nature is subject to PIS taxation or exempt
- 'T' # TAXABLE
- 'Z' # TAXABLE WITH RATE=0.00
- 'E' # EXEMPT
- 'H' # SUSPENDED
- 'N' # NO TAXABLE

pisExemptLegalReasonCode.description: When exempt, taxable with zero rate, suspended, not taxable, this field informs the official code number for the exemption

pisExemptLegalReason.description: When specified a reason, this field holds the reason's description

accruableCOFINSTaxation.description:
Inform if this item by nature is subject to COFINS taxation or exempt
- 'T' # TAXABLE
- 'Z' # TAXABLE WITH RATE=0.00
- 'E' # EXEMPT
- 'H' # SUSPENDED
- 'N' # NO TAXABLE

cofinsExemptLegalReasonCode.description: When exempt, taxable with zero rate, suspended, not taxable, this field informs the official code number for the exemption

cofinsExemptLegalReason.description: When specified a reason, this field holds the reason's description

pisCofinsCreditNotAllowed.description: on Real Profit Purchase transaction, inform if this item allows tax credits when it is non-cumulative

federalTaxRate.description: This is an array of tax object related to an agast.

notes.description: Free-form text for optionally adding any comment on this.

taxAdviserCode.description: This adds a purely informational information about the source of TaxAdviser imported data.

taxModel.description: Tax can be calculated by rate or by quantity

TaxType.description:
Tax Rate
Obs: AR - "a recolher" (servio).
RP e PP - filtrado para alvos de lucro real ou lucro presumido (servio)

referenceCode.description:
A custom, non-unique, non-mandatory reference code that might be used to reference
a company Reason record to a global Reason record.

companyId.description: If present, this record is scoped to the company.

disable.description: Set this message as no longer valid

legalCode.description: this field inform the official code number

showInInvoice.description: Optional. Show this message when used in Invoice (NFe, NFCe, others...). Where to show this.

taxConstraint.description: Filter this message application to specified tax cases.

taxType.description:
This is the Tax Type to apply legal messages.
- 'NONE'
- 'INSS'
- 'IRRF'
- 'IRPJ'
- 'PIS'
- 'COFINS'
- 'CSLL'
- 'IPI'
- 'ICMS'
- 'II'
- 'IOF'
- 'ISS'
- 'APROXTOTALTAX'

specializedTaxType.description:
These are the specific tax types to which a message may be applied
- 'icms'
- 'icmsSt'
- 'icmsStSd'
- 'icmsPartOwn'
- 'icmsPartDest'
- 'icmsDifaFCP'
- 'icmsDifaDest'
- 'icmsDifaRemet'
- 'icmsRf'
- 'icmsDeson'
- 'icmsCredsn'
- 'pis'
- 'pisSt'
- 'cofins'
- 'cofinsSt'
- 'ipi'
- 'ipiReturned'
- 'ii'
- 'iof'

precondition.description:
script rule that will evaluated to decide if this message is applicable.
if doesn't have rule is samething that return true value.

pisCofinsTaxReporting.description: when the company is Real Profit inform if this item is cumulative or no cumulative by default

accruableCSLLTaxation.description:
Inform if this item by nature is subject to CSLL taxation or exempt
- 'T' # TAXABLE
- 'E' # EXEMPT

issDueatDestination.description: for service items with City Jurisdiction, inform where the ISS tax is due

AgastService_Withhold.description: inform if this item is subject to withholding tax on service Transactions, default true

INSSSubjectPayrollTaxRelief.description:
Item subjecto to Payroll Tax Relief
Item sujeto  desoneraode folha de pagamento

PIS.description: inform if this item is subject to withholding PIS on service Transactions, by entity type, default true

COFINS.description: inform if this item is subject to withholding COFINS on service Transactions, by entity type, default true

CSLL.description: inform if this item is subject to withholding CSLL on service Transactions, by entity type, default true

startDate.description: date when this configuration values starts

expirationDate.description: date when this configuration values expire

subjectToST.description: inform that the item linked to this configuration is subject to ICMS ST on this state

icmsCST.description:
On sales process inform the CST hat the item linked to this configuration is subject to for the own ICMS
- 'T' # TAXABLE 00-Tributada
- 'E' # EXEMPT 40-Isenta
- 'H' # SUSPENDED 50-Suspenso
- 'D' # DEFERMENT 51-Diferimento
- 'N' # NO TAXABLE 41-Nao tributada
- 'O' # OTHER 90-Outras
- 'OZ' # OTHER AND ZERO VALUES 90-Outras

- 'Normal' # Normal
- 'Complementary' # Complemento de Valores
- 'Voided' # Anulao
- 'Replacement' # Substituto
- 'Return' # Devoluo ou retorno

overWriteCFOP.description: inform that the configuration process overwrites the cfop configuration.

class.description: Natureza da Oprerao - 'Describe kind of this transaction, summary

wayType.description: inform if the transaction is an operation to internalizing item or value

codInState.description: CFOP code (tax code operation) when the transactions are within the same state.

codOtherState.description: CFOP code (tax code operation) when the transactions are to another state.

codOtherCountry.description: CFOP code (tax code operation) when the transactions are to another country.

productType.description: this field is used to define right CFOP, one operation type can be specialized to item product, item merchandise or generic

operationToTaxPayerOtherState.description: field used to indicate an operation to ICMS tax payer

operationWithST.description: field used to indicate an operation to items sibject to ICMS-ST

operationToFreeZone.description: field used to indicate an operation to free zone

specificForProductClass.description: field used to indicate an operation to some product class specifically

stockImpact.description: Inform that the process has inventory impact.

financialImpact.description: Inform that the process has financial impact.

cstIPI.description:
Inform if this process is subject to IPI taxation on output process
- 'T'  # TAXABLE
- 'Z'  # TAXABLE WITH RATE=0.00
- 'E'  # EXEMPT
- 'H'  # SUSPENDED
- 'N'  # NO TAXABLE    
- 'I'  # IMMUNE
- 'O'  # OTHER
- 'OZ' # OTHER AND ZERO VALUES
- 'R'  # RETURN OF IPI

ipiLegalTaxClass.description:
Legal tax classificao for IPI (enquadramento)
When the processo has CST IPI 52 or 54, is mandatory inform Reason Code, see Anexo XIV - Cdigo de Enquadramento Legal do IPI from  http://www.nfe.fazenda.gov.br/portal/exibirArquivo.aspx?conteudo=mCnJajU4BKU=

lookupIPIFromReferredTransaction.description:
Busca IPI para adicionar na base de calculo de ICMS do item de uma nota referenciada, Exemplo, processo de venda para entrega futura e simples remessa de uma venda de entrega futura.
Lookup IPI tax to add to ICMS Tax base from same item of Referred Transaction

accruablePISTaxation.description:
Inform if this item by nature is subject to PIS taxation or exempt
- 'T'  # TAXABLE
- 'Z'  # TAXABLE WITH RATE=0.00
- 'E'  # EXEMPT
- 'H'  # SUSPENDED
- 'N'  # NO TAXABLE
- 'O'  # OTHER
- 'OZ' # OTHER AND ZERO VALUES

pisExemptLegalReasonCode.description: Reference to a tax reason record ID.

pisExemptLegalReason.description: When specifi reason, this field has the description

accruableCOFINSTaxation.description:
Inform if this item by nature is subject to COFINS taxation or exempt
- 'T'  # TAXABLE
- 'Z'  # TAXABLE WITH RATE=0.00
- 'E'  # EXEMPT
- 'H'  # SUSPENDED
- 'N'  # NO TAXABLE    
- 'O'  # OTHER
- 'OZ' # OTHER AND ZERO VALUES

cofinsExemptLegalReasonCode.description: When exempt, taxable with zero, suspended, not taxable, this field holds the official code number

cofinsExemptLegalReason.description: When specifi reason, this field has the description

allowIPIcreditWhenInGoing.description: Inform that the process allow IPI credit to Input process

icmsConf.description: the map key is state code

sameforAllDestination.description: when this attribute is true, the relationShip dont need be analysed

relationShip.description: the mapping key is state code / A chave do mapeamento  o cdigo do Estado.

icmsCSOSN.description: when the company is tax regime Simples uses CSOSN and for the same type of transaction, CST and CSOSN cant match

icmsCST.description:
On sales process inform the CST hat the item linked to this configuration is subject to
- 'T' # TAXABLE 00-Tributada
- 'E' # EXEMPT 40-Isenta
- 'H' # SUSPENDED 50-Suspenso
- 'D' # DEFERMENT 51-Diferimento
- 'N' # NO TAXABLE 41-Nao tributada
- 'O' # OTHER 90-Outras
- 'OZ' # OTHER AND ZERO VALUES 90-Outras

deferralrate.description: Percentual deferral rate, applied over ICMS tax when CST is D DEFEREMENT

messageCode.description: Message to add to NF when this configuration is used

hasCPOM.description: inform if seller has CPOM registry on destionation city, for this service.

cityCode.description:
The IBGE code of the related city. The city's ISS properties may be checked and set through
the `taxconf/iss/{cityCode}` service; (ISSConfByCity)

serviceCode.description:
The service code which this item is registered at the target city.
The "tax behavior" of this item at the target city may be checked and set through
the `taxconf/iss/{cityCode}/{serviceCode}` service. (ISSConfService)

complement.description: Any other information about the address (Room, Suite, Floor, etc)).
Any other information about the address (Room, Suite, Floor, etc)).
